actions.committee: Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Efficiency and Financial Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Efficiency and Financial Management

official_title: To repeal the provision of law that provides automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to eliminate automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.

titles.title: To repeal the provision of law that provides automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.
